customer_addr:

Oak Hills, CA 92344

citations.narrative:
There were three open bags and one open, uncovered plastic container of animal bedding material in the animal food and
bedding storage room. Additionally, there was an open bag of alfalfa pellets which were not fed to regulated species;
however, it was stored next to the open bedding material available for the regulated species. Open, unprotected food and
bedding supplies may attract vermin or other pests which may transmit disease and contaminate the bedding and food.
Supplies of food and bedding must be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration,
molding or contamination by vermin to ensure the health and well-being of all the animals. A system of food and bedding
storage which adequately protects these supplies must be in place.
Correct by 12/25/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There were three open bags and one open, uncovered plastic container of animal bedding material in the animal food and 
bedding storage room. Additionally, there was an open bag of alfalfa pellets which were not fed to regulated species; 
however, it was stored next to the open bedding material available for the regulated species. Open, unprotected food and 
bedding supplies may attract vermin or other pests which may transmit disease and contaminate the bedding and food. 
Supplies of food and bedding must be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, 
molding or contamination by vermin to ensure the health and well-being of all the animals. A system of food and bedding 
storage which adequately protects these supplies must be in place. 
 
Correct by 12/25/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
